languages.text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.
languages.original_text: While under the effect of Regimental Tactics, Astra Militarum commander and their allies' weapon attacks have +20% dodge, parry, block and cover reduction against targets that were already attacked by one of their allies.

traits.locale_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, their Single target melee and ranged attacks and Area of Effect attacks gain +20% to Dodge Reduction, Parry Reduction and Cover Penetration against enemies that are adjacent to the Commander or their allies.

While the Astra Militarum Commander is under the Combined Arms effect, their single target melee, ranged attacks, and area of effect attacks gain +20% to dodge reduction, parry reduction, and cover penetration against enemies adjacent to the Commander or their allies.

While the Astra Militarum commander is under the Regimental Tactics effect, their single target melee, {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g}, and area attacks gain +20% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover penetration{/g} against enemies adjacent to the commander or their allies.

While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

languages.text: Пока действует {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Эффективная муштра{/g}, атаки командира Астра Милитарум и его союзников с использованием оружия получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}, снижению блока и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} против врагов, которых в этом бою уже атаковали союзники командира.
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: Пока действует эффект {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Эффективной муштры{/g}, атаки командира Астра Милитарум и его союзников получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} в бою против врагов, которых в этом бою уже атаковали союзники командира.

Когда на командира Астра Милитарум действует способность Совместные учения, его одиночные атаки в ближнем и дальнем бою, а также атаки по области получают +20% к снижению уклонения, снижению парирования и пробитию укрытия против врагов, находящихся на соседних клетках с командиром или его союзниками.

Пока действует эффект {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Эффективной муштры{/g}, атаки командира Астра Милитарум и его союзников получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} в бою против врагов, которых в этом бою уже атаковали союзники командира.

Пока действует {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Эффективная муштра{/g}, атаки командира Астра Милитарум и его союзников с использованием оружия получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижению уклонения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижению парирования{/g}, снижению блока и {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}пробитию укрытия{/g} против врагов, которых в этом бою уже атаковали союзники командира.

languages.text: Solange der Effekt von {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimentstaktiken{/g} anhält, erhalten die Waffenangriffe des Astra Militarum-Commanders und seiner Verbündeten +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}, Blocken-Reduktion und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde, die in diesem Kampf bereits von den Verbündeten des Commanders attackiert wurden.
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: Solange der Effekt von {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimentstaktiken{/g} anhält, erhalten die Waffenangriffe des Astra Militarum-Commanders und seiner Verbündeten +20 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}, Blocken-Reduktion und {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungsdurchdringung{/g} gegen Feinde, die in diesem Kampf bereits von den Verbündeten des Commanders attackiert wurden.

languages.text: Tant que l'effet d'{g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Armes combinées{/g} est actif, les attaques armées du commandant de l'Astra Militarum et de ses alliés bénéficient de +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}, de réduction de blocage et de pénétration de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} contre les ennemis qui ont déjà été attaqués par les alliés du commandant au cours du combat.
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'effet d'{g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Armes combinées{/g} est actif, les attaques armées du commandant de l'Astra Militarum et de ses alliés bénéficient de +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g}, de réduction de blocage et de pénétration de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couverture{/g} contre les ennemis qui ont déjà été attaqués par les alliés du commandant au cours du combat.

Lorsque le commandant de l'Astra Militarum est sous l'effet d'Armes Combinées, ses attaques de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} à cible unique, ses attaques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} et ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} reçoivent un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}pénétration de couverture{/g} de +20 % contre les ennemis adjacents au commandant ou à ses alliés.

languages.text: {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}军团战术{/g}效果持续期间，星界军指挥官与其盟友使用武器攻击敌人时，如果该名敌人在本场战斗中已经被星界军指挥官的盟友攻击过，则此次武器攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}、格挡减免、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}穿透提高20%。
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}军团战术{/g}效果持续期间，星界军指挥官与其盟友使用武器攻击敌人时，如果该名敌人在本场战斗中已经被星界军指挥官的盟友攻击过，则此次武器攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}、格挡减免、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}穿透提高20%。

languages.text: Mientras dure el efecto de {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Tácticas de regimiento{/g}, los ataques con armas del comandante del Astra Militarum y de sus aliados ganan un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}, reducción de bloqueo y penetración de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} contra enemigos que hayan sido atacados previamente por los aliados del comandante en el combate actual.
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: Mientras dure el efecto de {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Tácticas de regimiento{/g}, los ataques con armas del comandante del Astra Militarum y de sus aliados ganan un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}, reducción de bloqueo y penetración de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g} contra enemigos que hayan sido atacados previamente por los aliados del comandante en el combate actual.

Cuando el comandante del Astra Militarum está bajo los efectos de {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Tácticas de regimiento{/g}, sus ataques de un objetivo cuerpo a cuerpo y a distancia y sus ataques de área ganan un +20 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}penetración{/g} de cobertura contra enemigos adyacentes al comandante o a sus aliados.

languages.text: {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}連隊戦術{/g}の効果が続く間、帝国防衛軍司令とその味方の武器攻撃は、この戦闘で司令官の味方によってすでに攻撃された敵に対して+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}、ブロック減少、および{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽貫通{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: 帝国防衛軍司令が連携軍隊効果を受けている時、その単体対象近接/遠隔/範囲攻撃は、司令やその味方に隣接する敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽貫通{/g}が+20%される。

帝国防衛軍司令が連隊戦術効果を受けている時、その単体対象{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}/{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔{/g}/{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲{/g}攻撃は、司令やその味方に隣接する敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽貫通{/g}が+20%される。

languages.text: {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Alay Taktikleri{/g} etkisi devam ettiği sürece Astra Militarum komutanı ile dost birimlerinin silah saldırıları; o çatışmada önceden saldırıya uğramış olan düşmanlara karşı +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g}, bloklama azaltımı ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} delme kazanır.
languages.original_text: While the effect of {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Regimental Tactics{/g} lasts, the Astra Militarum commander's and their allies' weapon attacks gain +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}, block reduction, and {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} penetration against enemies that have been already been attacked by the commander's allies this combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:34dad7246afb4e98ac1491bb24177463}Alay Taktikleri{/g} etkisi devam ettiği sürece Astra Militarum komutanı ile dost birimlerinin silah saldırıları; o çatışmada önceden saldırıya uğramış olan düşmanlara karşı +%20 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g}, bloklama azaltımı ve {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} delme kazanır.
